findings.lungs: Lung bases are clear. No pleural effusion.

hepatobiliary.liver: Homogenous attenuation throughout, no focal lesions.
hepatobiliary.biliary: No intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary dilatation.

pancreas.cystic_lesion: 2.5 cm cystic lesion in the pancreatic head, unchanged.

findings.spleen: 1.7 and 1.0 cm hypodense lesions, unchanged, likely cysts.
findings.urinary: Normal symmetric size, no focal renal lesions or hydronephrosis.

gastrointestinal.small_bowel: Normal caliber, wall thickness, and enhancement.
gastrointestinal.sigmoid_colon: Previously seen mild fat stranding resolved, multiple diverticula noted, areas of mild wall thickening suggestive of chronic diverticular changes, no active colitis.

findings.pelvis: Unremarkable urinary bladder and distal ureters, no free fluid.
findings.vascular: No abdominal aortic aneurysm, mild atherosclerotic disease noted.
findings.bones: No worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture, compression deformities of L1 and T11 vertebral bodies unchanged.
findings.soft_tissues: Coarse calcification in the right breast, multiple injection granulomas, small foci of subcutaneous gas likely related to injections.

changes_over_time.pancreas: Cystic lesion in the pancreatic head unchanged.
changes_over_time.sigmoid_colon: Mild fat stranding previously noted appears resolved.
changes_over_time.bones: Compression deformities of the L1 and T11 vertebral bodies unchanged.
